short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show or hide the annoying bottom login banner in twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you get annoyed when twitter shows a bottom banner when you are not logged in? This extension is just for that. You can hide it, and if you want to really log-in to twitter, use the check box in the extension pop up to unhide (show) it.
